text: Chisimu awala waakutawana namwe chilanga (mmwe Muhammadi ï·º), chisimu akutawana chilanga ni Allah, nkono wa Allah uli pachanya pa makono gao, sano jwatakase (chilanga chakwecho), nikuti akukasa kwalikonya nsyene, sano jwatakwanilisye yajwatawene najo Allah, basi (Allah) tachimpa malipilo gamakulungwa nnope
